# Penguin Plot: Practice Analysis



This is an analysis of the penguins from the ***Penguins Research Center***.  
The data here is available in the public domain  

## Setting up my environment 
Notes: Setting up R environment by loading `tidyverse` and `palmerpenguins` packages:
```{r Penguins, echo = T}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```
